app.title: IPA Analyzer - Complete iOS Optimization
app.description: Analyze and optimize your iOS applications with advanced technical precision

upload.title: IPA Optimizer
upload.subtitle: Analyze and reduce the size of your iOS applications

progress.connected: Connected - ready to receive progress updates

results.title: IPA Analysis Results
results.no_issues: Excellent! Your IPA is already well optimized. No major issues found.

duplicates.title: Remove duplicate files
duplicates.identical_names: These assets are identical but have different names:

images.title: Optimize large images
images.webp_recommended: WebP: RECOMMENDED for PNG with transparency (25-35% reduction)
images.heif_warning: HEIF/HEIC: For OPAQUE photos/backgrounds only (30-50% reduction)
images.avif_modern: AVIF (iOS 16+): Lightest with alpha, if targeting iOS 16+

errors.android_troll: üòÇ If you want to optimize your APK, start by porting it to iOS, otherwise it's too much work for nothing.

modal.guide_description: Implementation guide with Xcode settings and code examples

expert_tips.swift_compiler_desc: Enable -O (Optimize for Speed) and -whole-module-optimization for 15-25% binary size reduction.
expert_tips.lto_desc: Enable LLVM LTO for aggressive dead code elimination and function inlining optimizations.
expert_tips.strip_code_desc: Use -dead_strip and enable deployment post-processing to remove unused symbols and code.
expert_tips.modern_formats_desc: WebP (iOS 14+): 25-35% smaller than PNG. HEIF (iOS 11+): 30-50% smaller for photos without alpha.
expert_tips.app_thinning_desc: Use asset variants per device. Remove @1x assets for modern devices. Enable bitcode for further optimizations.
expert_tips.on_demand_resources_desc: Move non-essential content (tutorials, level assets) to ODR for 40-60% initial download reduction.

assets_analysis.title: Assets.car Analysis Results
assets_analysis.no_files: No Assets.car files found in this IPA.

status_messages.skipped: ‚è≠Ô∏è Analysis skipped (quick mode or large file)

assets_analysis.fix_duplicates: Use Xcode's Asset Catalog inspector to review and remove duplicate images. Keep only one version of identical assets and update any references.
assets_analysis.unused_note_desc: These are marked as potentially unused (iPad-specific assets). Verify they're not used in your iPad interface before removing.
assets_analysis.tip_remove_duplicates: üîß Remove duplicates: Eliminate {0} duplicate asset groups
assets_analysis.tip_clean_unused: üóëÔ∏è Clean unused assets: Review {0} potentially unused assets
assets_analysis.tip_format_optimization: üé® Format optimization: Convert PNG to WebP (iOS 14+) for 25-35% savings
assets_analysis.tip_resolution_review: üì± Resolution review: Remove unnecessary @1x/@3x variants for your target devices
assets_analysis.tip_compression: ‚öôÔ∏è Compression: Enable asset catalog compression in Xcode build settings

titles.remove_duplicate_assets: Remove duplicate assets across all catalogs
titles.review_unused_assets: Review potentially unused assets across catalogs

duplicate_files.review_each_group: Review each group to identify the "master" file to keep
duplicate_files.delete_duplicate_copies: Delete duplicate copies from your Xcode project
duplicate_files.update_references: Update any references to use the remaining file

large_images.webp_recommended: WebP (iOS 14+): RECOMMENDED for images with transparency - 25-35% reduction
large_images.heif_warning: HEIF/HEIC (iOS 11+): ONLY for opaque photos/backgrounds - 30-50% reduction
large_images.avif_modern: AVIF (iOS 16+): lightest with alpha, if targeting iOS 16+
large_images.optimize_existing_png: Optimize existing PNG with tools like ImageOptim
large_images.heif_transparency_warning: HEIF/HEIC may remove transparency in iOS pipelines. For alpha, use WebP or optimized PNG.

debug_symbols.debug_symbols_detected: Debug symbols detected in your app binary consuming approximately
debug_symbols.debug_info_format: Debug Information Format ‚Üí DWARF (not DWARF with dSYM)
debug_symbols.strip_debug_symbols: Strip Debug Symbols During Copy ‚Üí YES for Release builds
debug_symbols.strip_linked_product: Strip Linked Product ‚Üí YES for Release builds
debug_symbols.deployment_postprocessing: Deployment Postprocessing ‚Üí YES for Release builds
debug_symbols.release_configuration: Ensure you're building with Release configuration when archiving
debug_symbols.keep_dsym_warning: Keep dSYM files for crash symbolication in App Store Connect!

unused_architectures.found_unused_architectures: Found unused architectures in your binary
unused_architectures.remove_armv7: Remove armv7 from Valid Architectures (iOS 11+ doesn't support 32-bit)
unused_architectures.set_deployment_target: Set iOS Deployment Target to 11.0+ to drop armv7 automatically
unused_architectures.remove_simulator_archs: Remove i386/x86_64 if not targeting iOS Simulator distribution
unused_architectures.simulator_only: These are only needed for Simulator builds, not device/App Store
unused_architectures.archive_excludes_simulator: Archive builds automatically exclude simulator architectures
unused_architectures.use_generic_device: Ensure you're using 'Generic iOS Device' when archiving
unused_architectures.valid_architectures: Valid Architectures (VALID_ARCHS): arm64 only for modern apps
unused_architectures.excluded_architectures: Excluded Architectures (EXCLUDED_ARCHS): add unused archs here
unused_architectures.each_unused_arch: Each unused architecture can add 25-40% to your binary size!
unused_architectures.removing_armv7: Removing armv7: Drops iPhone 5c and earlier (minimal user base)
unused_architectures.keep_arm64: Keep arm64: Supports iPhone 5s and later (99.9% of active devices)
unused_architectures.binary_size_reduction: 25-40% binary size reduction per unused architecture

swift_optimization.binary_not_optimized: Binary appears to be compiled without optimization
swift_optimization.swift_code_generation: Swift Compiler - Code Generation ‚Üí Optimize for Speed (-O)
swift_optimization.optimize_for_size: Enable 'Optimize for Size' in Swift settings
swift_optimization.lto_yes: Link-Time Optimization ‚Üí YES (can reduce size by 10-15%)
swift_optimization.enable_bitcode: Enable Bitcode ‚Üí YES (allows App Store optimizations)
swift_optimization.lto_extra: LTO: Extra 5-10% reduction in final binary
swift_optimization.test_thoroughly: Always test thoroughly after enabling optimizations!
swift_optimization.modern_swift_optimizations: Modern Swift optimizations are very aggressive - the size savings can be dramatic.

optimization_messages.large_files_found: Your app contains {0} large files (>1MB) consuming {1}
optimization_messages.framework_optimization: Framework optimization can achieve 15-25% reduction, up to 58% in extreme cases.
optimization_messages.on_demand_resources: On-Demand Resources can reduce initial download by 40-60%.
optimization_messages.images_action: Images: Convert to modern formats (WebP, HEIF), reduce resolution
optimization_messages.audio_action: Audio: Use AAC instead of WAV, reduce bitrate for non-critical audio
optimization_messages.video_action: Video: Use HEVC encoding, consider streaming for long videos
optimization_messages.frameworks_action: Frameworks: Review necessity, consider alternatives, use dynamic linking
optimization_messages.data_action: Data/Assets: Compress JSON/XML, use binary formats when possible
optimization_messages.executables_action: Executables: Enable compiler optimizations, strip debug symbols
optimization_messages.use_app_thinning: Use 'App Thinning' to deliver device-specific assets
optimization_messages.consider_odr: Consider 'On-Demand Resources' for large media files
optimization_messages.enable_compression: Enable asset compression in Xcode build settings
